modName: A Simple Little Clean Up - Whiterun Stores
summary: This mod cleans up and adds items to Arcadia's Cauldron, Warmaiden's, and Belethor's General Goods.  It also fixes a few bugs and some annoying vanilla item placements that always get in the way.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][u]Info:[/u][/i][/b]
I changed many things (mostly clutter).

I purposely left the Bannered Mare and Drunken Huntsman alone because there are so many great mods out there that make them look better.

[b][i][u]The most notable changes are...[/u][/i][/b] 

-> [b]Arcadia's Cauldron...[/b]
﻿ ﻿- Added two flower beds and inserted plants.  It is as if Arcadia was growing her own ingredients :P
﻿ ﻿- Added a few more shelves and desks to showcase some of the items Arcadia is selling.
﻿ ﻿- Added a lot more items all around the store.
﻿ ﻿- Fixed a bug that hid a few candles and did not show their glow upstairs.
﻿ ﻿- Decorated the spaces that the developers left out.
﻿ ﻿- Moved items away from the area where you talk to the vendor over the counter so you don't "steal" anything.
﻿ ﻿- A LOT MORE LITTLE TWEAKS!!!

-> [b]Warmaiden's... [/b]
﻿ ﻿- Added a few dummies on the first floor.
﻿ ﻿- Added a few more shelves and desks to show case some of the items that are being sold.
﻿ ﻿- Added a lot more items all around the store.
﻿ ﻿- Fixed a bug that hid a few candles and did not show their glow around the store.
﻿ ﻿- Decorated the spaces that the developers left out.
﻿ ﻿- Moved items away from the area where you talk to the vendor over the counter so you don't "steal" anything.
﻿ ﻿- A LOT MORE LITTLE TWEAKS!!!

-> [b]Belethor's General Goods...
﻿[/b] ﻿- Took out that freaking table that was in the center of the room that always got in your way.
﻿ ﻿- Made Belathor's front desk larger.
﻿ ﻿- Added a few more shelves and desks to show case some of the items that are being sold.
﻿ ﻿- Added a lot more items all around the store.
﻿ ﻿- Decorated the spaces that the developers left out.
﻿ ﻿- Moved items away from the area where you talk to the vendor over the counter so you don't "steal" anything.
﻿ ﻿- A LOT MORE LITTLE TWEAKS!!!

There are a lot of changes that you may not notice simply because you wouldn't think to look for them.  I moved items around, added more furniture and items to go with them, and I even added more crates under some of the stairs.  All of this was done to make the stores look more like they are trying to move merchandise.  Like I said, I made a lot of little tweaks.   

If you want to keep making Whiterun better, check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56639/?][color=#6fa8dc][size=3]JK's Whiterun[/size][/color][/url].  The author did an amazing job.

[b][i][u]Requirements:[/u][/i][/b]
- Latest version of Skyrim.

[b][i][u]Installation:[/u][/i][/b] 
Use nexus or manually drop the .esp file into your "Data" folder.

[b][i][u]Compatibility:[/u][/i][/b] 
- Compatible with all mods that do not effect the interiors of Arcadia's Cauldron, Warmaiden's, and Belathor's General Goods.

[b][i][u]Known Issue(s):[/u][/i][/b]
- There are no known issues :) 

[b][i][u]Uninstallation:
[/u][/i][/b]AAAWWWWW....if you have to, just simply removethe .esp file from the "Data" folder or uninstall with nexus.

[size=3][color=#6aa84f]
[color=#6aa84f][size=3]And, as always, thank you for looking/downloading...  If you like my work, please remember to check out some of my other mods :)[/size][/color]
[/color]﻿ ﻿- [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57357/?][size=3][b]A Simple Little Clean Up - Breezehome[/b][/size][/url]
﻿[size=3][font=Times New Roman]- [/font][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57898/?][color=#6d9eeb][b][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Breezehome Front Porch - A Simple Little Add-On[/size][/font][/b][/color][/url]
[size=3]﻿﻿ ﻿- [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57490/?][size=3][b]Greybeard's Robe Unlocker[/b][/size][/url]
[b][size=3][color=#3d85c6][color=rgb(255,255,255)] ﻿- [/color][/color][/size][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57642/?][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][b]Executioner's Robe Unlocker and Headsman's Axe Modifier[/b][/size][/color][/url]
